add_library(sqlite src/sqlite3.c)

target_include_directories(sqlite PUBLIC src)

target_compile_definitions(sqlite PRIVATE
        SQLITE_OS_OTHER=1       #SQLITE has definitions for major OSes - UNIX, WIN etc. This define indicates that no known (at least to SQLITE) of is used
        SQLITE_TEMP_STORE=3     #Temporary files. The user must configure SQLite to use in-memory temp files when using this VFS
        SQLITE_THREADSAFE=0     #Use serialized thread-safe mode. This is fully supported threading environment setting
        SQLITE_MEMDEBUG=0
        SQLITE_OMIT_AUTOINIT=1  #If this is set user has to manually invoke sqlite3_initialize.
        SQLITE_DEFAULT_MEMSTATUS=0
        )

#Silence warnings generated by the sqlite3 implementation.
set_source_files_properties(src/sqlite3.c PROPERTIES COMPILE_OPTIONS "-Wno-unused-function;-Wno-overflow;-Wno-unused-variable;-Wno-unused-but-set-variable")
